Package ohos.media.common.sessioncore

Class AVControllerCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.sessioncore.AVControllerCallback

  • public abstract class AVControllerCallback
extends Object
    Provides callbacks to receive changes, for example, of playback states or media metadata from AVSession,You can use AVController.setAVControllerCallback(AVControllerCallback),to register a callback with the media session.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AVControllerCallback​()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onAVMetadataChanged​(AVMetadata metadata)
      Called when media metadata changes.
      void onAVPlaybackStateChanged​(AVPlaybackState state)
      Called when the playback state changes.
      void onAVQueueChanged​(List<AVQueueElement> queue)
      Called when the playback queue changes.
      void onAVQueueTitleChanged​(CharSequence title)
      Called when the playback queue title changes.
      void onAVSessionDestroyed​()
      Called when a request to destroy the media session is received.
      void onAVSessionEvent​(String event, PacMap options)
      Called when an event sent by the media session through AVSession.sendAVSessionEvent(java.lang.String, ohos.utils.PacMap) is received.
      void onOptionsChanged​(PacMap options)
      Called when additional information about the media session changes.

      • AVControllerCallback

        public AVControllerCallback​()

    • Method Detail

      • onAVSessionDestroyed

        public void onAVSessionDestroyed​()
        Called when a request to destroy the media session is received. You need to override this callback to process the request
        Since:
        3

      • onAVSessionEvent

        public void onAVSessionEvent​(String event,
                             PacMap options)
        Called when an event sent by the media session through AVSession.sendAVSessionEvent(java.lang.String, ohos.utils.PacMap) is received. You need to override this callback to handle the event
        Parameters:
        event - Indicates the name of the event that has been sent
        options - Indicates additional information about the event
        Since:
        3

      • onAVPlaybackStateChanged

        public void onAVPlaybackStateChanged​(AVPlaybackState state)
        Called when the playback state changes. You need to override this callback to handle the change
        Parameters:
        state - Indicates the new playback state, which is one defined in AVPlaybackState
        Since:
        3

      • onAVMetadataChanged

        public void onAVMetadataChanged​(AVMetadata metadata)
        Called when media metadata changes. You need to override this callback to handle the change
        Parameters:
        metadata - Indicates the new media metadata. For details, see AVMetadata
        Since:
        3

      • onAVQueueChanged

        public void onAVQueueChanged​(List<AVQueueElement> queue)
        Called when the playback queue changes. You need to override this callback to handle the change
        Parameters:
        queue - Indicates the updated playback queue. For details, see AVQueueElement
        Since:
        3

      • onAVQueueTitleChanged

        public void onAVQueueTitleChanged​(CharSequence title)
        Called when the playback queue title changes. You need to override this callback to handle the change
        Parameters:
        title - Indicates the new title of the playback queue
        Since:
        3

      • onOptionsChanged

        public void onOptionsChanged​(PacMap options)
        Called when additional information about the media session changes. You need to override this callback to handle the change
        Parameters:
        options - Indicates the updated additional information about the AVSession instance
        Since:
        3
